name: B. Tea with Tangerines
statement:
There are n pieces of tangerine peel, the i-th of them has size a_i. In
one step it is possible to divide one piece of size x into two pieces of
positive integer sizes y and z so that y + z = x.You want that for each
pair of pieces, their sizes differ less than twice. In other words,
there should not be two pieces of size x and y, such that 2x
le y. What is the minimum possible number of steps needed to satisfy the
condition?
